doc.previous: The original concept for Wikisource was as storage for useful or important historical texts These texts were intended to support Wikipedia articles by providing primary evidence and original source texts and as an archive in its own right The collection was initially focused on important historical and cultural material distinguishing it from other digital archives such as Project Gutenberg 1
doc.after: The project was originally called Project Sourceberg during its planning stages a play on words for Project Gutenberg 1
